alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 10:26AM CDT until June 14 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Stone County in north central Arkansas... South central Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Western Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1026 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dabney, or 13 miles west of Clinton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Shirley... Higden... Fairfield Bay Marina... Rocky Hill... Dabney... Fairbanks... Woolum... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Old Lexington... Choctaw... Bee Branch... Alread... Parma... Rushing... Rupert... Brownsville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
